description.en:
Crypto Rewards Studio
Digital Assets for the Fans
Own your favourite Celebrity, Youtuber, Music Band, or Sports Team as a digital currency created on top of the Ethereum Blockchain!
Crypto Rewards Studio (CRS) is a new revolutionary concept where fans can engage and interact with their favourite celebrities or brands by joining our tiered membership platform and gain access to their desired celebrity token created on the Ethereum Blockchain.
